exm.mng: to yearn for sth even in one's dreams (idiom), to long for sth day and night
to doze, to take a nap, nodding off to sleep
lit. awake or asleep, at any time
to rise early and sleep late (idiom); to work hard, to study diligently, to burn the candle at both ends
Mei, dinosaur genus, Mei long, dinosaur species
to toss and turn in one’s bed, unable to sleep (idiom)
